posts.post_content:
Probably will just go to eBay with these tomorrow night, but figured if someone here needed any of them, I'd give you first shot.  Feel free to make an offer any any of the below... nothing special, some better than others.  If you want to see bigger images, send me a PM with your email address.

AVAILABLE
Bresnahan (Bat) - SC350-30 - creasing
G. Brown (Chi) - P150 - creasing; paper loss front
Conroy (Fielding) - P150 - light creasing
Fromme - P350 - beater
B. Graham - P350 - back paper loss
S. Hofman - SC350-30 - beater
Killian (Pitching) - partially erased pencil on back above m in Piedmont
LaPorte - P350 - crease through face
M. Miller - OM - very light clear staining on back (adhesive?)
Moriarty - skinned
Pfeister (Seated) - P350 - good, but measures short vertically
Phillippe - P350 - very light creases
Taylor - P350 - G+ to VG-
Wallace - SC150-30 - top left corner crease; chipping near bottom above name

SOLD
Bliss - AB350F - creasing, hole
G. Davis - P350 - corner crease; measures short vertically
Geyer - S460 - creasing top left
Gibson - SC150-30 - beater
Krueger - P350 - bottom right corner crease; wet sheet transfer on front
Stahl (no glove) - P350 - oversized, chip on front
